p: The essential antigenic subgroups of VEEV are subtype (I), which also includes five subtypes of different origins: lA (Venezuela and Trinidad), IB (Peru and Argentina), IC (Venezuela and Colombia), ID (Colombia and Panama), lE (Panama and Mexico); Subtype (II) Florida; Subtype (III) Mucambo. Isolated in Brazil, Suriname, and Trinidad; Subtype (IV) Pixuna. Isolated so far only in Brazil; Subtype (V) Cabassou. Isolated in French Guiana mosquitoes; Subtype (VI). AG8O-663. Isolated in mosquitoes from Argentina [ 18, 20] (TableÂ 1).
